name: The Myths of Lightis -Begin the Age of Darkness
name_original: The Myths of Lightis -Begin the Age of Darkness
description:
The Myths of Lightis -Begin the Age of Darkness- is a classic turn-based RPG in its gameplay and poetic in its universe.

Felix Vengelis, God of Light of Lightis incognito, wishes to rid Lightis of a deep evil coming from the world of Tenebra. But Elana, a mysterious woman from Tenebra, also wishes to destroy this curse, which is as bad for Tenebra as it is for Lightis. The alliance of two worlds which have little in common is essential for the salvation of peace.

This demo on RPG Maker, basis for a more advanced game running on Godot, contains the introduction and the first chapter. French only for this time, english version coming soon.

_______________________________________

Les Mythes de Lightis -Commence le Temps des Ténèbres- est un RPG tour par tour classique dans son gameplay et poétique dans son univers.

Félix Vengélis, Dieu de la Lumière de Lightis incognito, souhaite débarrasser Lightis d'un mal profond venu du monde de Tenebra. Mais Elana, mystérieuse femme de Tenebra, souhaite également anéantir ce mal, qui ronge autant Tenebra que Lightis.L'alliance de deux mondes qui n'ont que peu de choses en commun est essentielle pour le salut de la paix.

Cette démo sur RPG Maker, base pour un jeu plus avancé tournant sur Godot, contient l'introduction et le premier chapitre.
